com.gej.sound

Class MidiPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.gej.sound.MidiPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MidiPlayer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Implements a player to play MIDI audio data. Needs to construct a player for every MIDI file you play. Can also pause and loop.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
